summary: Pearl Jam is an American rock band from Seattle, Washington, formed in 1990. The current members are Jeff Ament, Stone Gossard, Mike McCready, Eddie Vedder, and Matt Cameron. They gained popularity with their debut album, "Ten," which stayed on the Billboard charts for almost five years. The band is known for being a key part of the grunge music movement in the 1990s. They've sold over 85 million albums worldwide and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2017. Pearl Jam is also known for advocating for social and political causes.
title: Pearl Jam
